title: Building Permit Application Forms
summary: Complete taxonomy of SF building permit application forms. Forms 1-8 cover all construction types from new buildings to demolition. Also includes trade permits, green building forms, disabled access forms, and inspection forms.

permit_forms.name: Application for Building Permit (new construction - Type I, II, III, IV)
permit_forms.use_when: Construction of new buildings with Type I, II, III, or IV construction
permit_forms.notes: Mark Form 1 checkbox on the Form 1/2 combined application

permit_forms.name: Application for Building Permit (new construction - Type V wood frame)
permit_forms.use_when: Construction of new wood-frame buildings with Type V construction
permit_forms.notes: Mark Form 2 checkbox on the Form 1/2 combined application

permit_forms.name: Application for Building Permit (additions, alterations, or repairs)
permit_forms.use_when: Additions, alterations, and repairs on existing buildings
permit_forms.notes: Most building applications require this form. Projects require other agencies to review plans or may need neighborhood notification.

permit_forms.name: Application for Permit to Erect Sign
Permit application for grading, excavation, fill, or quarry
permit_forms.use_when: Grading, excavation, fill, or quarry work

permit_forms.name: Application for Demolition Permit
permit_forms.use_when: Demolishing an existing building or structure
permit_forms.notes: Often used with Form 1/2 for new construction projects that involve demolishing existing buildings first

permit_forms.name: Application for Building Permit (OTC/no plans)
permit_forms.use_when: Small projects that can be reviewed over the counter or projects that do not require plans
permit_forms.notes: Mark Form 8 checkbox on the Form 3/8 combined application

special_applications.name: Detached ADU Pre-Approval Application
special_applications.use_when: Submitting plans for pre-approval of detached Accessory Dwelling Units

special_applications.name: Demolition Affidavit Form
special_applications.use_when: Required to declare mortgage/deed holders have been notified

applicant_forms: Permit Applicant Disclosure and Certification form
disabled_access_forms: Disabled Access Upgrade Compliance Checklist Package
Disabled Access Compliance Checklist (all commercial TI projects)

form_selection_logic.demolition: Form 6 (often paired with Form 1/2 for rebuild)
